pullrequest.title: Merge chunks from all genomedata archives for window selection

content.raw:
This Try catch clause is going to crash with the following error if the Genome() class raise an exception (l.2029):

- UnboundLocalError: local variable 'genomes' referenced before assignment 

Maybe the try block should be in a for loop (for genomedata_name in self.genomedata_names: Genome(...))
content.html:
This Try catch clause is going to crash with the following error if the Genome() class raise an exception (l.2029):

  • UnboundLocalError: local variable 'genomes' referenced before assignment

Maybe the try block should be in a for loop (for genomedata_name in self.genomedata_names: Genome(...))
